title: Bloomberg's Rie on Antitrust Issues For Bayer-Monsanto (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg's Rie on Antitrust Issues For Bayer-Monsanto (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Jennifer Rie, Senior Litigation Analyst for Bloomberg Intelligence: Bayer's proposed acquisition of Monsanto is likely to face rigorous review by antitrust regulators.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
